Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><vmName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hypervisorName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><vmHost class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><resourcePool class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><dataCenterName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><vmNetwork class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><dataStore class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><companyName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><ovaPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: DeployVM
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><vmPassword class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">commvault!12</vmPassword><scriptPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><scriptlogPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><failureMessage class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><vmIPAddress class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><vmSyncCount class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">10</vmSyncCount><dataCenterName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">SDDC-Datacenter</dataCenterName><vmHost class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Cluster-1</vmHost><vmNetwork class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">computenetwork</vmNetwork><ovaPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">C:\OVA\commvaultappliance.ova</ovaPath><ovftoolpath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">C:\Program Files\VMware\VMware OVF Tool\ovftool</ovftoolpath><dataStore class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">WorkloadDatastore</dataStore><resourcePool class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Compute-ResourcePool</resourcePool><gatewayClientName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><gatewayHostname class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><gatewayPort class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><proxiesClientGroup class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><firewallStop class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">sudo systemctl stop firewalld;sudo systemctl disable firewalld</firewallStop><scriptPath_FW class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><scriptLogPath_FW class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><unixOvfPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">ovftool</unixOvfPath><enableFirewall class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">False</enableFirewall><ovaUnixPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">/opt/ova/commvaultappliance.ova</ovaUnixPath></variables>

inputs.val: <inputs />

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>set nocount on

declare @csName nvarchar(1024)
declare @csHostName nvarchar(1024)
declare @csUserName nvarchar(1024)
declare @csPassword nvarchar(1024)
declare @vmID int
declare @email nvarchar(1024)
declare @vmName nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmName"]}','')
declare @vmGUID nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/XPathQuery_27/result}','')

declare @vmIP nvarchar(1024)
declare @vmAccountName nvarchar(1024) = 'root'
declare @vmAccountPwd nvarchar(max)
declare @vmPolicyId int
declare @vmOsType int = 2
declare @vmClientname nvarchar(1024)
DECLARE @vmClientId int

if (ISNULL(@vmName,'')='')
begin 
    select 0 as status,'VMName value are empty or  VM is not availabl' as ErrorMessage
end
else
begin
     select @vmID =vm.id,
     @vmClientname = cl.name,
	 @vmGUID = vm.GUID,
	 @vmClientId=vm.clientId,
	 @vmIP = isnull(vmIp.value('@ipAddress','nvarchar(1024)'),'')
	 from APP_VM vm inner join APP_VMHost vmh on vmh.id=vm.vHostId
	 inner join app_client cl on cl.id=vm.clientId
	 CROSS APPLY vm.vxml.nodes('/QSMServer_QVirtualMachineReq') as vmIp(vmIp) 
	 where vm.guid=@vmGUID

-- for cs 
select @csName=cl.name,@csHostName=cl.csHostName from app_client cl where cl.id=2
select @csUserName=us.login, @csPassword=us.password from umusers us where us.id =1
--Getting email details
select @email=email from umusers where id=(select attrval from app_clientprop where componentNameId=11 and attrName='Virtual Machine Created by User')

IF LEN(@vmIP) > 15 --IPv4 max len is 15
BEGIN	
    SET @vmIP = ''
END
ELSE IF ISNULL(@vmIP,'') !='' AND LEN(@vmIP) > 0
BEGIN
    update app_client set net_hostname = @vmIP where id = @vmClientId
END 
     select @csName as 'csName', @csHostName as 'csHostName',@csUserName as 'csUsername' ,
   @csPassword as 'csPassword',@vmClientId as 'vmClientId', @vmClientname 'vmClientname', @vmName as 'vmName',@vmIP as 'vmIP',
   @vmOsType as 'osType',@vmClientname as 'clientName',@vmGUID as 'vmGUID' ,@email as emailId,  @vmAccountName 'vmUsername'
end
set nocount off
	</query></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="String osType="";
if(xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="osType"]}==2)
 osType="Unix";
else osType="Unknown";
String ClientName=xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmClientname"]};
String ClientHostName=xpath:{/workflow/variables/vmIPAddress};
String CSName=xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="csName"]};
String CSHostName=xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="csHostName"]};
String CSUserName=xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="csUsername"]};
String CSPassword= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="csPassword"]};
String authCode= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="authCode"]};
String encryptCSPassword = (utils.encryptString(CSPassword)).toString();
Integer vsaProxyOSType = xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="osType"]}; //vsaproxy
//String decodedString = commvault.cte.util.Base64.decode(xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmPassword"]});
//String decrypted = utils.decryptString(decodedString);
//workflow.setVariable("vmPassword",decrypted);
String scriptPrefix = "C:\\Windows\\Temp\\RegistrationScript_";


//String XmlInput="@echo Powershell.exe -executionpolicy remotesigned -File C:\\Windows\\Temp\\CVAutoDeployment\\baseInitScript.ps1";
String XmlInput="@echo sudo pwsh /etc/baseInitScript.ps1";
if(vsaProxyOSType.equals(2)){
scriptPrefix = "/tmp/RegistrationScript_";
XmlInput="echo sudo pwsh /etc/baseInitScript.ps1";
}

String scriptPath=scriptPrefix+String.valueOf(xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId})+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}+".sh";
String scriptlogPath=scriptPrefix+String.valueOf(xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId})+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}+".log";

XmlInput+=" "+osType;
XmlInput+=" "+ClientName;
XmlInput+=" "+ClientHostName;
XmlInput+=" "+CSName;
XmlInput+=" "+CSHostName;
XmlInput+=" "+CSUserName;
XmlInput+=" "+encryptCSPassword;
XmlInput+=" "+xpath:{/workflow/variables/enableFirewall};
XmlInput+=" NA"; //CSFirewallPort
XmlInput+=" NA"; //ClientFirewallPort
XmlInput+=" NA"; //" "+xpath:{/workflow/variables/gatewayHostname};
XmlInput+=" NA"; //" "+xpath:{/workflow/variables/gatewayClientName};
XmlInput+=" NA";//" "+xpath:{/workflow/variables/gatewayPort};
XmlInput+=" NA"; //httphostname
XmlInput+=" NA"; //port
if(authCode != null && authCode.length() > 0){
XmlInput+=" "+authCode;
}else{
XmlInput+=" NA"; //authCode
}
XmlInput+=" NA"; //csplainpassword
// turn off firewall on unix nodes if there is no FW configured else CS is not able to communicate
if (osType.equalsIgnoreCase("Unix"))
{
if(vsaProxyOSType.equals(2)){
workflow.setVariable("firewallStop","echo 'sudo systemctl stop firewalld;sudo systemctl disable firewalld'");
}else{
workflow.setVariable("firewallStop","@echo | set /p c=sudo systemctl stop firewalld;sudo systemctl disable firewalld");
}
 
 workflow.setVariable("scriptPath_FW",scriptPrefix+String.valueOf(xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId})+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}+".fw.sh");
 workflow.setVariable("scriptLogPath_FW",scriptPrefix+String.valueOf(xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId})+xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}+".fw.log");
}
workflow.setVariable("scriptPath",scriptPath);
workflow.setVariable("scriptlogPath",scriptlogPath);
return XmlInput;
" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>set nocount on
declare @vmGUID nvarchar(256) = 'xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmGUID"]}'
declare @vmIP nvarchar(256)
declare @vmClientId int
select 
	 @vmIP = vmIp.value('@ipAddress','nvarchar(1024)') ,
	 @vmClientId =  vm.clientId
	 from APP_VM vm inner join APP_VMHost vmh on vmh.id=vm.vHostId
	 inner join app_client cl on cl.id=vm.clientId
	 CROSS APPLY vm.vxml.nodes('/QSMServer_QVirtualMachineReq') as vmIp(vmIp) 
	 where vm.GUID=@vmGUID 
IF LEN(@vmIP) > 15 --IPv4 max len is 15
BEGIN    
   SET @vmIP = ''
END
ELSE IF ISNULL(@vmIP,'') !='' AND LEN(@vmIP) > 0
BEGIN
    update app_client set net_hostname = @vmIP where id = @vmClientId
END
     
 select @vmIP as 'vmIP'
 
 set nocount off
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	</query></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to delay the workflow execution in minutes
Activity.name: Delay

inputs.val: <inputs><delayLength class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">1</delayLength><delayInterval class="workflow.types.DelayInterval" _list_="false">Minutes</delayInterval></inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>set nocount on


--input
declare @errorMessage nvarchar(1024)
declare @errorCode int =0
declare @hypevisorName nvarchar(max)= isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/hypervisorName}','')
declare @dataCenterName nvarchar(max)= isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/dataCenterName}','xpath:{/workflow/variables/dataCenterName}')
declare @resoucePool nvarchar(max)= isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/resourcePool}','xpath:{/workflow/variables/resourcePool}')
declare @hostName nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmHost}','xpath:{/workflow/variables/vmHost}')
declare @networkName nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmNetwork}','xpath:{/workflow/variables/vmNetwork}')
declare @dataStore nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/dataStore}','xpath:{/workflow/variables/dataStore}')
declare @vmName nvarchar(1024) = isnull('xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}','AutoDemo')
declare @emailId nvarchar(1024)= (select email from umusers where id =xpath:{/workflow/system/executor/userId})
declare @companyId  int = isnull((select top 1 id from UMDSProviders where hostName='xpath:{/workflow/inputs/companyName}') , 0)

IF @dataCenterName = ''
    SET @dataCenterName = 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/dataCenterName}'
IF @resoucePool = ''
    SET @resoucePool = 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/resourcePool}'
IF @hostName = ''
    SET @hostName = 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/vmHost}'
IF @networkName = ''
    SET @networkName = 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/vmNetwork}'
IF @dataStore = ''
    SET @dataStore = 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/dataStore}'                                     
--output
declare @username nvarchar(max)
declare @password nvarchar(max)
declare @vcentername nvarchar(max)
declare @vsaproxyClient nvarchar(max)
declare @vsaproxyClientId int
declare @osType int
declare @hypervisorClientId int
declare @authCode nvarchar(max)
declare @ovfToolPath nvarchar(max)
declare @scripType nvarchar(max)

 --intermediate
 declare @instanceId int 
 
if isnull(@hypevisorName,'') = ''
begin
	set @errorCode = -1
	set @errorMessage = 'Provide valid vcenter/hypervisor name'
	goto ERROR_EXIT
end
select @instanceId =app.instance, @hypervisorClientId = c.id from app_client c inner join app_application app on app.clientId=c.id and apptypeid=106 where c.name =@hypevisorName

--if client name doens't match get from the vcentername
if isnull(@instanceId,0) = 0
select @instanceId = componentnameId from app_instanceprop where attrval = @hypevisorName and attrname='Virtual Server Host'

if isnull(@instanceId,0) = 0
begin
	set @errorCode = -1
	set @errorMessage = 'Provide valid vcenter/hypervisor name'
	goto ERROR_EXIT
end
select @vcentername = attrval from app_instanceprop where componentnameId = @instanceId and attrname='Virtual Server Host'

select @username = attrval from app_instanceprop where componentnameId = @instanceId and attrname='Virtual Server User'

select @password = attrval from app_instanceprop where componentnameId = @instanceId and attrname='Virtual Server Password'


select @authCode = cast(cpp.attrVal as nvarchar(max)) from  App_CompanyProp cpp	
		where
		 cpp.componentNameId = @companyId
		and cpp.attrName = 'Authorization Code'
		and cpp.modified = 0


CREATE TABLE #tmpTable
	(
		OutputValue XML
	)
	declare @inputxml xml

	declare @output xml
    SET @inputxml = '<App_GetVSMemberServersRequest expandClientGroup="1"><entity _type_="5" instanceId="' + convert(varchar(10),@instanceId) + '"/></App_GetVSMemberServersRequest>'

    INSERT INTO #tmpTable(OutputValue) 
    EXEC AppGetVSMemberServers @inputxml
    
    SELECT @output = OutputValue FROM #tmpTable
    DROP TABLE #tmpTable
    select @vsaproxyClient = g.x.value('@clientName','nvarchar(max)') , @vsaproxyClientId =  g.x.value('@clientId','nvarchar(max)') from @output.nodes('/App_GetVSMemberServersResponse/associatedClients/memberServers[1]/client[1]') g(x)
    SET @osType = isnull((select 1  from simInstalledPackages where clientId=@vsaproxyClientId and simPackageId = 713),2)

	IF @osType = 1 --Windows
	BEGIN
		SET  @scripType		= 'WindowsBatch'
		SET  @ovfToolPath	= 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/ovftoolpath}'
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		SET  @scripType = 'UnixShell'
		SET  @ovfToolPath	= 'xpath:{/workflow/variables/unixOvfPath}'
	END


ERROR_EXIT:
select @errorCode 'errorCode' , @errorMessage 'errorMessage', @hostName 'hostName', @networkName 'networkName',
  @vmName 'vmName', @instanceId 'instanceId', @vcentername 'vcentername', @username 'username',
  @password 'password', @hypevisorName 'hypervisorName', @hypervisorClientId 'hypervisorClientId' , 
  @vsaProxyClient 'vsaProxy', @dataCenterName 'dataCenterName' , 
  @dataStore 'dataStore', @resoucePool 'resourcePool', @authCode 'authCode', @companyId 'companyId',
  @scripType 'scriptType',  @ovfToolPath 'ovfToolPath', @osType 'osType'

set nocount off
	</query></inputs>

Activity.description: Sends an email to a list of users
Activity.name: Email

inputs.val:
<inputs><email class="workflow.types.Email"><to class="java.lang.String">xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="emailId"]}</to><cc class="java.lang.String" /><bcc class="java.lang.String" /><from class="java.lang.String" /><subject class="java.lang.String">VM [xpath:{/workflow/inputs/vmName}] creation is failed</subject><body class="java.lang.String"> 
VM creation failed with error : xpath:{/workflow/variables/failureMessage}
</body><attachments class="java.lang.Object" /><html class="java.lang.Boolean">false</html><repeatInterval /></email></inputs>

Activity.name: WorkflowEnd

inputs.val: <inputs><completionStatus class="workflow.types.WorkflowCompletionStatus" _list_="false">FAILED</completionStatus><failureMessage class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/failureMessage}</failureMessage></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="
String vCenterName = xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="vcentername"]};
String vCenterUserName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="username"]};
String vCenterPassword = utils.decryptString(xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="password"]});
String vmName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmName"]};
String dataStore= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="dataStore"]};
String hostName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="hostName"]};
String dataCenterName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="dataCenterName"]};
String resourcePool= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="resourcePool"]};
String networkName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="networkName"]};

String ovaPath= xpath:{/workflow/inputs/ovaPath};

if(ovaPath == null || ovaPath.length() == 0){
 if(xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="osType"]}!=null && xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="osType"]} ==1){
 ovaPath = xpath:{/workflow/variables/ovaPath};
 }else{
 ovaPath = xpath:{/workflow/variables/ovaUnixPath};
 }
}

//ovftool --acceptAllEulas --noSSLVerify --acceptAllEulas --diskMode=thin --powerOn --name="autodemo1" --datastore="ESX02-DS02" "F:\Projects\RAX\OVA\commvaultvsa.ova" "vi://username:Password@blrvsavc1.idcprodcert.loc/BLRVA/host/bdcvsaesx02.idcprodcert.loc/Resources/Compute-ResourcePool/"

String ovfpath = "\""+xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="ovfToolPath"]}+"\"";
String command = ovfpath + " --acceptAllEulas --noSSLVerify --acceptAllEulas --diskMode=thin --powerOn --X:waitForIp --name=\""+vmName+"\" --network=\""+networkName+"\"";
command +=" --datastore=\""+dataStore+"\" \""+ovaPath+"\" \"vi://"+vCenterUserName+":"+vCenterPassword+"@"+vCenterName+"/"+dataCenterName+"/host/"+hostName+"/Resources/"+resourcePool+"/\"";

logger.info("command"+command);

return command;

//workflow.setVariable("vmPassword",decodedString);" /></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="String vmName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="vmName"]};
int hypervisorClientId= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="hypervisorClientId"]};
String hypervisorName= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="hypervisorName"]};
int instanceId= xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_3/resultSets/row/col[@name="instanceId"]};



String previewInv= "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\" ?><EVGui_PreviewInventoryReq createClientsForDiscoveredVms=\"0\" previewInventoryRespType=\"0\">"
 + "<appId applicationName=\"Virtual Server\" apptypeId=\"106\" clientId=\""+hypervisorClientId+"\" clientName=\""+hypervisorName+"\" instanceId=\""+instanceId+"\" instanceName=\"VMware\"/>"
 + "<contentEntity allOrAnyChildren=\"0\">"
 + "<children allOrAnyChildren=\"1\" displayName=\""+vmName+"\" equalsOrNotEquals=\"1\" name=\"\" path=\"\" type=\"10\"/>"
 + "</contentEntity><filterEntity allOrAnyChildren=\"0\"/></EVGui_PreviewInventoryReq>";
return previewInv;" /></inputs>
